hero.description: I’m passionate about Frontend and Backend development with experience in Javascript, React.js, Angular.js, MySQL, PHP, and Laravel. I specialize in building modern, fast, and scalable digital solutions with a focus on user experience and code quality.

about.description: Frontend and Backend developer with experience in multiple technologies. Passionate about building efficient and scalable web applications. Self-taught and committed to continuous learning and best development practices.

list1: Development of full web applications (frontend and backend)
Focus on performance and user experience
list2: Integration of external APIs and third-party services

items.title: POS Sales System, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: FullStack POS system with responsive design using PHP 8, MySQL, HTML, CSS, jQuery, and Bootstrap. MVC architecture for multi-branch, user roles, inventory, e-invoicing (Colombia), reports, and daily cash control. Designed for development and commercialization.

items.title: E-commerce Platform, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: Ecommerce platform in PHP with modular MVC architecture for managing products, users, and orders. Integrated REST API for CRUD operations and admin panel based on AdminLTE 3.2.0. Focused on scalability and clean code structure.

items.title: Document Management System, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: Document system built with PHP (CodeIgniter 4, MySQL) using scalable MVC architecture, allowing creation, editing, organization, and advanced search of files.

items.title: Online Marketplace, Bogotá (Freelance Project)
items.description: Marketplace built with PHP 8 and MySQL using RESTful architecture, payment gateways integration, user registration, chat interface, and multi-vendor system.

items.title: SENA Intern, Sistemas EnLinea S.A. Bogotá (Internship)
items.description: Created Angular components and forms, explored microfrontend architecture, studied and applied User Story Mapping, and designed basic prototypes and Angular libraries.

items.title: Software Analysis and Development
items.description: SENA: Servicio Nacional de Aprendizaje (Bogotá D.C)

items.title: High School Diploma, Instituto Tomas Moro, Bogotá
Complete Web Development with HTML5, CSS3, JS, AJAX, PHP and MySQL, Udemy
Deep Dive into HTML and CSS, Platzi

frontend.title: Frontend
frontend.description: I specialize in frontend development to build modern and functional websites using technologies like HTML, CSS, JavaScript, React, Angular, and Laravel. I always focus on delivering optimized and scalable solutions.

backend.title: Backend
backend.description: I develop backend applications using Node.js, ensuring seamless integration with databases and APIs to offer optimal performance and an exceptional user experience.

webapps.title: Web Applications
webapps.description: I build custom web apps with ReactJS, focusing on dynamic, fast, and responsive user experiences.

ecommerce.title: Ecommerce
ecommerce.description: Ecommerce project in PHP with modular MVC architecture to manage products, users, and orders. Includes REST API for CRUD and admin panel using AdminLTE 3.2.0. Focused on scalability and clean code.

pos.title: Point of Sale System (POS)
pos.description: POS system in PHP (MVC) with multi-branch, user roles, inventory management, e-invoicing (Colombia), reports, and daily cash control. Built for development and commercialization.

marketplace.title: Marketplace
marketplace.description: Marketplace built in PHP8/MySQL with RESTful API, payment gateways, user registration, conversational UI, and multi-vendor system.

filemanager.title: File Manager
filemanager.description: Document management system in PHP/CodeIgniter 4/MySQL for creating, editing, organizing, and advanced file search. Scalable MVC architecture.
